summary: <<Oblivion Weaponry>> Adds NEW, EPIC Weapons to the smithing table. It should bring nostalgia and remind you of good'ol dagon and his crisis.
descriptionHtml:
This mod contains smith-able weapons with Daedric stats.

Package includes: 
Dagger 
Longsword
Greatsword

You'll need <<Daedric Smithing Perk>> to make the weapons in this mod. Otherwise you could just search for the weapons by name in the console

I.e:
help "oblivion longsword" 4
player.additem <<hex code>> 1


You are free to use this as you please as long as you give proper credits and tell me about it.

okokokok / KingWinter
author: KingWinter

files.name: Oblivion Weaponry
files.changelogHtml:
Mesh-fix and new textures for the longsword.

Updated the file with a longsword to complete the Weaponry package

Made the weapons stand-alone

Updated the file with a dagger to follow the Greatsword.
